title: Housing
vision: All residents have access to quality housing, infrastructure, and neighborhood spaces that promote community cohesion and are affordable

targets.name: Affordable housing
targets.content: Reduce percentage of cost-burdened residents down to 43% from 53%

targets.name: Homelessness
targets.content: Reduce the number of homeless residents by 50%

definitions.definition: Severe housing cost burden refers to households that spend at least 50% of their income on housing costs.

charts.chartTitle: Severe housing cost burden by neighborhood, 2015
charts.source: US Census Bureau, American Community Survey

charts.chartTitle: Severe housing cost burden by tenure, 2015
charts.source: US Census Bureau, American Community Survey

charts.chartTitle: Homeownership rate by age of householder, 2015
charts.source: DataHaven analysis, American Community Survey via IPUMS

charts.chartTitle: Homeownership rate by age and race, 2015
charts.source: DataHaven analysis, American Community Survey via IPUMS
